name: Blast to the Past (project_Games)
description:
Use your Rewinder Technology to rewind yourself and enemies to a previous position. Use this power to solve these puzzles that will test your thinking and platforming skills.

Made in 7 days for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2. The theme was rewind.

Controls
  • WASD to move and jump
  • Mouse to aim and shoot your Rewinder
  • E to rewind yourself
  • R to restart the level
  • Escape or P to pause
Credits
  • Programming and Design by p-han-tom and BootleBen 
  • Art by BootleBen 
  • Music: Groove by Evan King 
    • His Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/evankingaudio
    Buy this song at: https://https//evanking.bandcamp.com/
